授業目的: This course helps students pursue their individualized programs of researches to write graduation theses. They are required to present creative oral reports and submit written assignments in each class.
到達目標:
After completing theses the students will have:
1. Learned how to complete a research project.
2. Learned how to collect and systematize a substantial amount of information on the selected topics.
3. Obtained English speaking/writing skills at an advanced level.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
group discussion
individual presentation
English-medium instruction
---------------------------------

Basically in-person classes. The course will be shifted online on Zoom anytime during the semester when clear covid-19 symptoms are observed on campus.

トピック.授業計画1: Weekly in-class interviews and final presentations of the students' graduation theses.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to complete all assignments on time to prepare for the in-class interviews.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Levels of discussions and the final presentation.
